title: Merchant
summaries: The Merchant is an NPC vendor that will spawn once the following conditions have been met:

• There is an empty House.
  • All players in the game world total more than 50 SC between them in their inventories. Coins stored in chests and portable storage items like the Piggy Bank do not count toward this requirement.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, these requirements only apply to the initial spawning. If the Merchant is killed, he will automatically respawn after some time.

On the <linked>[img:Old-gen console version]</linked><linked> Old-gen console version</linked> and <linked>Nintendo 3DS</linked><linked>[img:Nintendo 3DS version]</linked><linked> version</linked>, if the Merchant is killed, he will only respawn if the above conditions are met again.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, the Merchant will lob <linked>Throwing Knives</linked> at nearby enemies to defend himself, dealing 12 / <linked>18</linked> / <linked>21</linked> damage at the start of the game, and as players progress he will gain <linked>various stat increases</linked>.
